body.p:
There are multiple ways to download Synopsys Bridge
Download the latest version of Synopsys Bridge from the Synopsys Artifactory:
Polaris users can download Synopsys Bridge from the Polaris user interface:
Click username at the top right.
Select Accounts.
Select Downloads.
Choose the appropriate package for your operating system.
Install Synopsys Bridge in the directory of your choice using the appropriate unzip tool for your OS.
If you need to install a new version of Synopsys Bridge, delete the old version if using the same install directory.
